TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi beforefieldinit SmartLabelStyle extends System.Object

summary.span: Provides methods and properties used to perform intelligent, rule-based data point label positioning to resolve overlapping data point label issues.

span.span: Provides methods and properties used to perform intelligent, rule-based data point label positioning to resolve overlapping data point label issues.

summary.span: Gets or sets a flag that indicates whether a algorithm is enabled.

span.span: Gets or sets a flag that indicates whether a algorithm is enabled.

value.span: 如果演算法將會套用至防止資料點標籤重疊。

span.span: if an algorithm will be applied to prevent data point labels from overlapping.

value.span: 將不會防止重疊的資料點標籤。

span.span: if overlapping of data point labels will not be prevented.
The default value is .

summary.span: Gets or sets a flag that specifies whether the point labels are allowed to overlap a point marker.

span.span: Gets or sets a flag that specifies whether the point labels are allowed to overlap a point marker.

value.span: 如果資料點標籤不允許與資料點標記重疊。

span.span: if data point labels are permitted to overlap point markers.

value.span: 如果資料點標籤將禁止重疊的點標記。

span.span: if data point labels will be prevented from overlapping the point markers.
The default value is .

MemberSignature.Value: public virtual bool IsOverlappedHidden { get; set; }
.property instance bool IsOverlappedHidden
Public Overridable Property IsOverlappedHidden As Boolean
public: virtual property bool IsOverlappedHidden { bool get(); void set(bool value); };

summary.span: Gets or sets a flag that indicates whether overlapped labels that cannot be repositioned will be hidden.

span.span: Gets or sets a flag that indicates whether overlapped labels that cannot be repositioned will be hidden.

value.span: 如果會隱藏標籤，如果發生重疊。

span.span: if labels will be hidden if they overlap.

value.span: 如果將不會隱藏標籤重疊。

span.span: if overlapped labels will not be hidden.
The default value is .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 如果無法屬性所指定的區域內繪製點和，所允許之方向，屬性，而這個屬性是`true`，不會繪製資料點標籤。If the point cannot be drawn within the area specified by the properties and , in the directions allowed by the , property, and this property is `true`, the data point label will not be drawn. > [!NOTE] > 智慧標籤只能搭配使用時屬性設為零。Smart labels only work when the property is set to zero.

MemberSignature.Value: public virtual double MaxMovingDistance { get; set; }
.property instance float64 MaxMovingDistance
Public Overridable Property MaxMovingDistance As Double
public: virtual property double MaxMovingDistance { double get(); void set(double value); };

summary.span: Gets or sets the maximum distance, in pixels, that the overlapped object can be moved from the marker.

span.span: Gets or sets the maximum distance, in pixels, that the overlapped object can be moved from the marker.
A value.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 此屬性指定的最大距離，單位為像素的資料點，允許資料點標籤重疊時可移動。This property specifies the maximum distance in pixels from the data point that data point labels are allowed to be moved in case of overlapping.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 此屬性指定的最小距離，單位為像素的資料點，允許資料點標籤重疊時可移動。This property specifies the minimum distance in pixels from the data point that data point labels are allowed to be moved in case of overlapping.

System.ComponentModel.Editor("System.Web.UI.Design.DataVisualization.Charting.FlagsEnumUITypeEditor, System.Web.DataVisualization.Design, Version=4.0.0.0, Culture=neutral, PublicKeyToken=31bf3856ad364e35", "System.Drawing.Design.UITypeEditor, System.Drawing, Version=4.0.0.0, Culture=neutral, PublicKeyToken=b03f5f7f11d50a3a")

summary.span: Gets or sets the direction(s) in which the overlapped object is allowed to be moved.

span.span: Gets or sets the direction(s) in which the overlapped object is allowed to be moved.

value.span: A列舉值或多重位元 OR 具有值。

span.span: A enumeration value or multiple bitwise OR'd values.

value.span: 預設值是所有的位元 OR值，以便讓不同的資料中心點的所有方向中重新定位。

span.span: The default is the bitwise OR of all values to allow repositioning in all directions except to the center of the data point.
